home.heroDesc: Gura amatike ya bisi kuva mubigo byinshi, kurikirana urugendo rwawe mugihe nyacyo, kandi ugenda ufite ikizere.
home.whyChooseDesc: Ubunararibonye urugendo rutagira ibibazo hamwe nurubuga rwacu rwuzuye rwo gutumiza
home.multipleAgenciesDesc: Ugereranya kandi uhitemo mubakoresha ba bisi byizewe bitandukanye
home.securePaymentsDesc: Wishyure neza ukoresheje amafaranga ya mobile cyangwa amakarita yinguzanyo
home.realTimeTrackingDesc: Kurikirana aho bisi yawe iri mugihe nyacyo kuri karita
home.easyBookingDesc: Gura amatike yawe mu ngingo nke gusa
home.popularAgenciesDesc: Genda hamwe nabakoresha ba bisi byizewe cyane
home.howItWorksDesc: Gura itike rya bisi yawe mubyiciro 4 byoroshye
home.step1Desc: Shakisha kandi uhitemo umukoresha wa bisi ukunda
home.step4Desc: Kurikirana bisi yawe kandi wishimire urugendo
home.ctaDesc: Injira mubantu bihumbi bahongerewe bemereje gutumiza amatike ya bisi yawe

hero.title: Gura Itike Rya Bisi Kuri Interineti
hero.subtitle: Urugendo Rutejwe Ubwoba, Ruturutse kandi Rufite Igiciro Cyiza
hero.description: Shakisha kandi ugure amatike ya bisi mu gihugu hose byoroshye. Ugereranya ibihe, ibiciro, n'ibyiza by'ibigo bya bisi byizewe.

features.title: Kubera Iki Wotuhitamo
features.safeTravelDesc: Genda hamwe n'ibigo bya bisi byemewe kandi byizewe
features.bestPricesDesc: Ugereranya ibiciro kandi ubone amasezerano meza
features.easyBookingDesc: Gura amatike yawe mu ngingo nke gusa
features.supportDesc: Turi hano kugirango tugufashe igihe cyose

footer.description: Umufatanyabikorwa wawe wizewe ku rugendo rw'ibisi rworoshye kandi rufite igiciro cyiza mu gihugu hose.
